en-US.name: Star Wars Databank (Unofficial)
en-US.summary: The ultimate power in the galaxy!  A full reference to everything in the Star Wars Universe.  Ask about anything!
en-US.description:
The ultimate power in the galaxy!  A full reference to everything in the Star Wars Universe.  You can ask about any character, droid, creature, vehicle, weapon, technology, location, species, or organization.  Try things like:

"Tell me about Ahsoka Tano"
"Who is Amilyn Holdo?"
"What is IG-88?"
"What is a rathtar?"
"Give me information about the Millennium Falcon"
"What is an ion cannon?"
"Tell me about moisture vaporators"
"What is sabacc?"
"Tell me about Dagobah"
"What is a kowakian monkey-lizard?"
"Tell me about Crimson Dawn"
I made this as a Star Wars fan, and this skill is not associated with Star Wars, Lucasfilm, or Disney in any way.
examplePhrases: show the opening crawl for Episode 5

publishingInformation.testingInstructions:
I have clearly made the name of my skill include the word UNOFFICIAL.  But as I review the skills store, there are lots of skills that don't have an invocation name that follows the rules you are requiring of me.
